ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
ack.p: This work was funded by the HRP Alliance, part of the UNDP/UNFPA/UNICEF/WHO/World Bank Special Programme of Research, Development and Research Training in Human Reproduction (HRP) and the UNICEF/UNDP/World Bank/WHO Special Programme for Research and Training in Tropical Diseases (TDR), both cosponsored programs hosted by the World Health Organization (WHO). The Pan American Health Organization (PAHO) provided technical support throughout project implementation. We are grateful to the public health and epidemiologic surveillance teams at the health department of Villavicencio, particularly Dr Alexandra Pardo, and Janeth Pinilla, from the SEP group, for her support and assistance.
